description: This talk will discuss the features and benefits of the Postgres Plus Cloud Database product, a fully elastic and dynamic scalable PostgreSQL database which can be launched in minutes in both public and private clouds. Postgres Plus Cloud Database also provides an inexpensive proven alternative for moving applications written to run on Oracle into a cloud environment.

title: Hans Hrasna: Postgres Plus Cloud Database
